info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 07 at 3:27AM CDT until August 07 at 4:15AM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 AM CDT FOR WESTERN BEAVER AND NORTHEASTERN TEXAS COUNTIES... At 326 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Baker, or 12 miles southwest of Liberal, moving southeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Hooker, Tyrone, Baker, Adams, Boyd, Turpin, Floris and Balko. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
